arts.ttl: Watford 1-1 Bristol City: Twine cancels out early Marc Bola goal to ensure points are shared
arts.sum: The Hornets got themselves into the lead of the match only six minutes into proceedings when Marc Bola ran on to the end of a great pass from Imran Louza and placed his effort into the back of the net. An excellent free-kick from Scott Twine that could not be kept out by Egil Selvik drew Bristol City level on the half-hour mark.

arts.ttl: Twine's free-kick salvages point for Bristol City against Watford
arts.sum: Scott Twineâ€™s free-kick earned Bristol City a 1-1 draw at Watford.

arts.ttl: Twine free-kick cancels out SUPERB Watford opener as Bristol City earn point!
arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Bristol City and Watford.

arts.ttl: Watford vs Bristol City predictions: Hornets buzzing at Vicarage Road
arts.sum: Aaron Ashley expects Watford to extend their impressive winning run on home soil when they welcome a depleted Bristol City to Vicarage Road on Friday.
There is a full round of Championship matches taking place across Friday and Saturday and Aaron Ashley has a correct score prediction for all 12 games.
